description: Tests for resume bullets, emails, and marketing copy rewriting

test_results.input: Worked on a Python project for a startup
test_results.target_role: Senior Backend Engineer at Google - Python, distributed systems, cloud deployment
test_results.output: Architected and deployed production Python microservices for cloud infrastructure, achieving 45% improvement in system throughput. Led implementation of distributed caching layer using Redis, reducing database queries by 60%. Mentored junior developers on Python best practices and code optimization, improving team velocity by 35%. Resulted in 99.9% uptime SLA and $2.1M annual cost savings through infrastructure optimization.
